entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text: @NikkiHaley How many people could have been helped if we would have invested in the Pandemic Task Force instead of a useless wall? Or Golf at Mar-A-Lago, or rallies to stroke the maggot's ego?  We can do this all day Nikki.
